globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://sheets.googleapis.com https://*.in.applicationinsights.azure.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src * 'self'; media-src * 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; form-action 'none'; manifest-src 'self'
